TENET — the Future
of Interactive Media

TENET is a next-generation interactive media platform that enables millions of viewers to influence live content in real time — voting, commenting, and choosing story directions — while giving broadcasters full control of the process, access to real-time analytics, and the ability to personalize content for specific viewer segments.

Monetization

Flexible Options to Grow Your Revenue Stream
